references.paper_title: Loss of plasticity in continual deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is among the most important because it introduces the concept of plasticity loss in continual deep reinforcement learning, a key topic explored in the main paper.
This paper is among the most important because it introduces the warm-start problem, a closely related phenomenon to plasticity loss which is also investigated in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Understanding and preventing capacity loss in reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is among the most important because it directly addresses capacity loss, a similar issue to plasticity loss and it explores several mitigation strategies that are also compared in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Deep reinforcement learning with plasticity injection
references.reason: This paper is among the most important because it proposes a novel intervention method (plasticity injection) to address plasticity loss, a method also investigated and compared in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Maintaining plasticity in deep continual learning
references.reason: This paper is among the most important because it focuses on maintaining plasticity in continual learning, directly addressing a challenge explored and contrasted with the findings of the main paper.
